body_html: I'm happy to discuss that if there are any concerns. The reason why we should assume is the newest version, is that someone might actually construct the state dict (half-)manually, e.g. by stitching together a few other dicts. In that case they will lack the field, but the best thing we can do is assume that they are matching our new formats, not the legacy ones.

body: I'm happy to discuss that if there are any concerns. The reason why we should assume is the newest version, is that someone might actually construct the state dict (half-)manually, e.g. by stitching together a few other dicts. In that case they will lack the field, but the best thing we can do is assume that they are matching our new formats, not the legacy ones.
